name: Unstoppaball
description:
Unstoppaball is a 2D sidescrolling-platformer with high octane smashing and platforming!

Play as a wrecking ball and smash everything in your path as fast as you can! Be careful not to get stuck against a wall; you'll get stopped! If this ever happens, try to get space from the wall and smash through it again.

Smash on!

Warning: Default volume is loud! (Didn't implement sound settings : ( ) Use windows volume mixer to lower it if needed.
